stack:stack.stack:script:
/opt/stack/bin/stack report host network &Kickstart_PrivateHostname; | \ /opt/stack/bin/stack report script > /tmp/do-network.sh
chmod a+x /tmp/do-network.sh /tmp/do-network.sh
/opt/stack/bin/stack report host interface &Kickstart_PrivateHostname; | \ /opt/stack/bin/stack report script > /tmp/do-interface.sh
chmod a+x /tmp/do-interface.sh /tmp/do-interface.sh
